chunks.content: Immediately in front of the Main Building and facing it, is a copper statue of Christ with arms upraised with the legend 'Venite Ad Me Omnes'.

metadata.relevance_reason: This sentence directly answers the question by specifying what is located in front of the Notre Dame Main Building.
metadata.answer_contribution: Identifies the copper statue of Christ as being in front of the Main Building.

required_info: what is located in front of the Notre Dame Main Building
